articles.author: Chris Donkin
articles.title: AR player prepares slimmed-down glasses for US, Europe - Mobile World Live
articles.description: Xreal Technology announced the forthcoming release of its Air 2 into the increasingly competitive augmented reality eyewear sector.
articles.content: Xreal Technology announced the forthcoming US and European release of its Air 2 into the increasingly competitive AR eyewear sector, pushing the design as being comfortable, lightweight and accessibl… [+1378 chars]
